guidelines.id: id is the unique identifier of the link. it should begin with 'link-'.
guidelines.icon: The icon is a angular material icon. You can search icons from https://fonts.google.com/icons?selected=Material+Symbols+Outlined:account_balance:FILL@0;wght@400;GRAD@0;opsz@24&icon.query=finance
guidelines.url: URL refers to internal module or external link. If module, it's configuration should be configured in app-routing.module.ts
